title: Method of UAV Inspection of Photovoltaic Modules Using Thermal and RGB Data Fusion
summary: The subject of this research is the development of an intelligent, integrated framework for the automated inspection of photovoltaic (PV) infrastructure that addresses the critical shortcomings of conventional methods, including thermal palette bias, data redundancy, and high communication bandwidth requirements.
